lenders.name: Line
lenders.loan_because:
I make loans because I feel a call to duty to women all over the world who need a hand up.

Giving another woman a hand up is the single most indulgent privilege I can think of, and I can attest that through my own giving, in return, I receive a personal joyfulness that is far more valuable than any form of currency that anything else can ever hope to match.

We must all do what we can to make a affirmative contribution in the world. I hope you will take me up on that challenge and do something that will truly make a significant difference. Instead of a handout, try making a loan that will give another deserving woman a genuine hand up!

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: We loan because together, we wish to live lives of Christian faithfulness to God's command of justice. Recognizing God's call to justice (Micah 6:8) we want to reflect a commitment to help others in need. I loan because the triune God calls us to care for others in ways that recognize their dignity.  and efforts to provide for others. I recognize God's calling to seek to alleviate poverty by sharing a portion of what God has graciously given to me. In this way, I can express the love of Christ to others.
